summary: Created comprehensive Persian documentation of the complete CMS/Admin structure (CMS_STRUCTURE_DOCUMENTATION.md). Documented all domains (AiTools, Courses, Blog, Commerce, Core, Auth), all models with their fields and relationships, all Filament resources and admin pages, settings system (GeneralSettings, SeoSettings), SEO and sitemap system, redirect and 404 monitoring system, commerce and payment system, authentication and authorization, enums, policies, and database structure. Documentation is organized in Persian as requested by the user.
current_status: Complete CMS structure documentation created. The system includes 10 Filament resources, 2 settings pages, redirect management, 404 monitoring, sitemap generation with SEO settings integration, and full commerce/payment flow. All models properly use HasSEO trait and are searchable where applicable.
